key.name: sigma
key.summary: Global sigma (gaussian blur radius) to use

key.name: brightness
key.summary: Global brightness to use

key.name: hacks-level
key.summary: Level of hacks to use (from 0 to 2)

key.name: overview-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur the overview or not

key.name: overview-general-values
key.summary: Boolean, whether to use general values for overview blur sigma/brightness or not

key.name: overview-sigma
key.summary: Global sigma (gaussian blur radius) to use for overview

key.name: overview-brightness
key.summary: Global brightness to use for overview

key.name: appfolder-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur appfolders or not

key.name: appfolder-general-values
key.summary: Boolean, whether to use general values for appfolder blur sigma/brightness or not

key.name: appfolder-sigma
key.summary: Global sigma (gaussian blur radius) to use for appfolder

key.name: appfolder-brightness
key.summary: Global brightness to use for appfolder

key.name: appfolder-icon-opacity
key.summary: Opacity of appfolder icon to use

key.name: appfolder-dialog-opacity
key.summary: Opacity of appfolder dialog to use

key.name: panel-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur the panel or not

key.name: panel-general-values
key.summary: Boolean, whether to use general values for panel blur sigma/brightness or not

key.name: panel-sigma
key.summary: Global sigma (gaussian blur radius) to use for panel

key.name: panel-brightness
key.summary: Global brightness to use for panel

key.name: panel-static-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to have a static blur on panel or a dynamic one

key.name: dash-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur the dash or not

key.name: dash-to-dock-general-values
key.summary: Boolean, whether to use general values for dash-to-dock blur sigma/brightness or not

key.name: dash-to-dock-sigma
key.summary: Global sigma (gaussian blur radius) to use for dash-to-dock

key.name: dash-to-dock-brightness
key.summary: Global brightness to use for dash-to-dock

key.name: dash-to-dock-static-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to have a static blur on dash-to-dock or a dynamic one

key.name: dash-opacity
key.summary: Opacity of dash to use

key.name: applications-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur applications that request it or not

key.name: applications-general-values
key.summary: Boolean, whether to use general values for applications blur sigma/brightness or not

key.name: applications-sigma
key.summary: Global sigma (gaussian blur radius) to use for applications

key.name: applications-brightness
key.summary: Global brightness to use for applications

key.name: lockscreen-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to change the default lockscreen blur or not

key.name: lockscreen-general-values
key.summary: Boolean, whether to use general values for lockscreen blur sigma/brightness or not

key.name: lockscreen-sigma
key.summary: Global sigma (gaussian blur radius) to use for lockscreen

key.name: lockscreen-brightness
key.summary: Global brightness to use for lockscreen

key.name: window-list-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to blur window list extension or not

key.name: window-list-general-values
key.summary: Boolean, whether to use general values for window-list blur sigma/brightness or not

key.name: window-list-sigma
key.summary: Global sigma (gaussian blur radius) to use for window-list

key.name: window-list-brightness
key.summary: Global brightness to use for window-list

key.name: hidetopbar-blur
key.summary: Boolean, whether to try compatibility with hidetopbar@mathieu.bidon.ca or not

key.name: debug
key.summary: Boolean, set to true to activate debug mode (more verbose journalctl logs)
